content: Turtle Treasure can be found in the Furnace Valley. To reach it from the Valley Entrance Keeper's Shrine, run straight ahead until you can drop into the lava river on the right. Turn around in the lava and head back in the direction you came from to find Turtle Treasure guarding a chest at the end of the lava flow.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Turtle_Treasure_Spirit.md", within the section "Turtle Treasure Spirit" and the sub-section "Turtle Treasure Location". The content is presented below:

Turtle Treasure can be found in the Furnace Valley. To reach it from the Valley Entrance Keeper's Shrine, run straight ahead until you can drop into the lava river on the right. Turn around in the lava and head back in the direction you came from to find Turtle Treasure guarding a chest at the end of the lava flow.
